title: Roman candle
summaries: The Roman candle is a magic weapon. It fires a small firework that changes colors. At a fairly short range it splits into three separate fireworks, each of them exploding into three streams of color. The Roman candle is purchased from the Demolitionist for 5 GC, during Christmas.
The Roman candle cannot be reforged, and therefore cannot have <linked>modifiers</linked>.

statistics.Buy: 5 GC
